message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SE, cs.NI

The paper discusses the threat of malware attacks and the need for efficient anti-malware solutions, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the potential of machine learning for detecting and categorizing malware, which falls under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the need for autonomous solutions with minimal human intervention, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper discusses the use of network-level and host-level solutions, which falls under the category of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
